name: AOA Studio Collection makeup Sponge Set Latex Free and High-definition Set of 6 makeup Wonder blender For Powder Cream and Liquid, Super Soft Wonder Beauty Cosmetic
about_this_item: ❣️Made from Latex free makeup blender sponge.
❣️Makeup sponges for BB cream, cosmetic foundation, concealer, powder, liquid, and etc.
❣️It's unique shape allows the blender to be used for many different products and easy to grip.
❣️Wet and dry use and easy to clean.

title: First Time User - So Soft and Easy to Use
content: I don't normally wear much makeup but since I have gotten older, I decided to try some foundation to help even out my complexion.  I wanted something to help me apply it evenly, so I researched and found these Super Soft Paw Paw makeup sponges.  After reading the reviews, I decided to try them.  They are so soft and make it easy to apply the foundation.  I also started to use them to apply my concealer and blush which I always use and normally just blended with my fingers.  The one thing I did find after washing them with a little Dawn dish soap and warm water is they still have some residue left on them from the foundation, concealer and blush.  It's not a big deal to me - I still reuse them after washing but that was the directions that were recommended.  I have another package sitting in my cart for future purchase.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on May 30, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I’ve religiously used Beauty Blender for years now, but in this economy, a $20 face sponge had to be the first thing to go. These are a great, mush cheaper alternative! They have a great bounce, and actually soak up less product, meaning I use a lot less product! They don’t smell, like some cheap sponges do, and the color doesn’t run too much with the first couple uses. These are great, cheap sponges!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: I love these sponges! I got them as disposable travel sponges because I hated packing my wet, freshly used (expensive) beauty blender in my suitcase right before closing it up. After using this brand for a couple of days I end up using these as my everyday sponges and stopped buying the beauty blender brand since these do the exact same thing. What I do now is use a new one the day I am traveling and then take the older, dry one with me on vacation and then just toss it after my last use. I haven’t had any issues with my makeup absorbing into them or anything else, but I do use a new one about every month or so.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2024
